caption.title: Net charge over time in ( A) negative ( P < 2.2 × 10 −16), ( B) positive ( P < 2.2 × 10 −16), and ( C) zero ( P < 2.2 × 10 −16) branches of HA1 subunit.
caption.p: This figure is just as in 1A, except only the immunodominant HA1 subunit is being considered.
